answers.text:
Alexandra - a number of Alliance for Innovation members use a software called Open City Hall that lets citizens see upcoming agenda items and post their comments.  it is provided by Peak Democracy. Check out Palo Alto CA website.

answers.text:
Alexandra, we have a comment feature that is available for each agenda item with the website component of our video hosting and archiving piece for local government meetings. The citizen clicks the link and a pop-up form appears for them to enter their comment on. We can also give you stats on how many times a certain agenda item video has been viewed.
